items.instruction: Pass the tag end through the eye of the hook.
items.image_description: Diagram showing fishing line passing through hook eye.

items.instruction: Wrap the tag end around the standing line 5-7 times.
items.image_description: Diagram showing tag end wrapping around main line.

items.instruction: Pass the tag end back through the loop closest to the hook eye.
items.image_description: Diagram showing tag end going through the first loop formed.

items.instruction: Pass the tag end through the large loop that has now formed.
items.image_description: Diagram showing tag end going through the larger loop.

items.instruction: Moisten the knot with saliva and pull both the standing line and tag end to tighten.
